title: Come home to Village on the Green! 1 Bed / 1 Bath available!
map_address: 2975 Continental Colony Pkwy SW near Verdant Dr SW
posting_body: ['RENT:', '$1412 - $1638/Month |', 'SIZE:', '884 sq ft |', 'BEDROOMS:', '1 |', 'BATHROOMS:', '1', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 9-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'ABOUT COMMUNITY:', 'Life is meant to be enjoyed.', 'Finding a home to be enjoyed is as important as anything in life.', 'Village on the Green will help you enjoy life with its fantastic amenities, quaint location, and spacious floor plans.', 'These apartments for rent in Atlanta, GA are the perfect fit for you and your family.', "We're close to East Lake, Hartsfield Jackson International Airport and The Camp Creek Marketplace, ensuring a convenient home that you will love.", 'Village on the Green is proudly managed by Peak Living.', 'At Peak Living, our mission is to provide the highest quality property management services in the industry.', 'We achieve this through our greatest asset; our people.', 'Our on-site and regional management teams offer unsurpassed customer service and local expertise for those living at our properties and for our clients.', 'Pet Policy: Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Pets - allowed, Max weight 50 lb each, One time Fee $350.00, Rent $15.00', 'Comments: Cats and dogs are welcome.', 'Dog breeds that are known to be aggressive are strictly prohibited.', '350.00 non-refundable pet deposit per pet.', 'Pets must be at least 12 months with vet records.', 'Restrictions: Pit Bull, Rottweiler, Chow, Doberman Pinscher, Akita', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '● 9 Ft Ceilings', '● Black Appliances', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Lazy Susan Cabinet', '● Microwave', '● Roman Tub', '● Sun Rooms', '● Terrace Level', '● Walk in Closets', '● Hardwood Flooring in Select Units', '● Individual Alarm Systems Available', '● Large Thermal Windows in Each Home', '● Washer-Dryer Connections in Walk-in Laundry Room', '● Wired for High-Speed Internet & Cable TV', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', '● Business Center', '● Car Care Center', '● Fitness Center', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Pet Friendly', '● Playground', '● Pool', '● Public Transportation', '● Shopping Nearby', '● Tennis Court', '● Accepts Credit Card Payments', '● Attached Garages', '● Close to East Lake, and The Camp Creek Marketplace', '● Close to Hartsfield Jackson International Airport', '● Controlled Access/Gated', '● Freeway Access', '● Quaint Location', '● Resort-Style Pool', '● Roommate-Style Floor Plans Available', '● State-of-the-Art Cardio and Strength Center', 'CONTACT US TODAY!', 'Village on the Green', '2975 Continental Colony Pkwy SW', 'Atlanta, GA 30331', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Professionally managed by Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '220A66158EA9449']
